3: The vault doors are... right there!
...In range! Commandant, I need your authorization!
Got it! Now, time to... Huh? Access denied?
Alright, tough guy, let's take a crack at your root-level access with my heightened privileges...
None of the ports are responding...! Oh, you've got to be—you're telling me it's physically firewalled off?!
We'll have to cut the hinges and the safety valves to crack it open.
This door looks like it's built to last until the end of time. You sure you can cut through it?
Not after I'm done with it.
You may have a handle on software, but when it comes to hardware... I'm your gal.
